name: WP Post Notifier For All
author: Fay√ßal Tirich

sections.description: Notify all WordPress users (and not only the admin) on every post publishing. The notification is only sent on the first publishing action and not after every update.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-post-notifier-for-all to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Set your notification template
